text: The atomic number of hydrogen is 1.
The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.
The Yeti is a real creature that lives in the Himalayas.
The speed of sound is approximately 343 meters per second in air.
The Great Sphinx of Giza has the body of a lion and the head of a human.
The human tongue can taste only four basic flavors.
The Milky Way galaxy contains billions of stars.
The Bigfoot is a real primate species that has eluded scientific discovery.
The human brain uses approximately 20% of the body's total energy.
